name: Fire Emblem: Shin Monshou no Nazo
name_original: Fire Emblem: Shin Monshou no Nazo
description: The 12th game in the Fire Emblem series and a remake of Fire Emblem: Monsho no Nazo, released only in Japan for the DS. It is the first Fire Emblem game since the series' international debut to not be released in territories outside of Japan.
